start.description: You wake up in a dark dungeon. There's a door ahead and something shiny on the floor.

get_key.description: It's a rusty key. You pick it up.

go_to_door.description: You stand before a large wooden door. It's locked.

open_door.description: You use the key to unlock the door. Light pours in as you step out to freedom. You win!

door_locked.description: The door is locked. You tug at it hopelessly. Maybe you missed something?
